title: France panorama. [No. 70/20]
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/France - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/France - Social life and customs
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Cities and towns - France
description: French cinemagazaine items including: 1. For sportslovers - a new stadium on the banks of the Seine houses 5,400 spectators and has facilities for volley-ball, boxing, rowing, gymnastics, Japanese martial arts etc. 2. Chemistry and industry - an exhibition showcasing the chemical industry. 3. Le Havre Municipal Recreation Centre. 4. Art market - the galleries and auction rooms of Paris. 5. Space robot (an electrified sculpture). 6. New sitting of the Chambre des Deputies. 7. Sports and champions - France vs USSR in swimming - Georges Pompidou, Maurice Schumann. 8. Homage to Leon Poirier - tribute to a mayor of Perigord who had been a pioneer filmmaker. 9. The Avant-Garde School - "La Saurce" an innovative school near Paris. 10. The Treasure of the Devil - story of a priest who spent a fortune restoring old buildings in a village in central France.
